Name: Milky Way Map
About the game: Milky Way Map This game is a puzzle game that I completed it by myself. (Program, art and music, All is made by me alone) Game using Unreal Engine to create it, 3D game locked perspective. Game Features 1. Unreal Engine 3D render and Light Effect. 2. Original Music and Sound Effects. 3. Through the beautiful render and comfortable music, exposure to the pattern puzzle thinking, experience the fun of fresh puzzle game. 4. Infinite levels, Infinite challenges, you can always come across new puzzles and challenges! 5. Pure hexagonal grid geometry knowledge of the show 6. By level picture save feature, your efforts in the game will not be wasted, you can take the generated pattern (png format image file) to do anything you want! Gameplay Click Rotate hexagonal independent small pattern, think of ways to match the formation of a closed loop unique big picture. The core gameplay is to solve puzzles, unlimited puzzles, each pass will be more difficult than the last pass, and each pass will bring a new puzzle level. Because the games made with Unreal Engine that have beautiful experience of pictures and beautiful music for you, You can feel the meaning of education of puzzle through the fresh patterns met by each new levels and the puzzle solved by each new pattern . The game must play more than the 30th level, otherwise you will not experience the core gameplay of this game! Try it if it looks interesting.
